pullRequest.title: Adding test to verify image update for WLS domain
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adding test to verify image update for WLS domain.
Kind new parallel test result 9/30
https://build.weblogick8s.org:8443/job/weblogic-kubernetes-operator-kind-new/2195/testReport/

commit.message: refactor the code after syncing to the latest develop branch

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * Verify the admin server is accessible and cluster member is healthy
          
          
            
               * Verify the admin server is accessible and cluster members are healthy
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -848,6 +858,83 @@ public void testCreateNewCluster() {
 
   }
 
+  /**
+   * Modify the domain scope property
+   * From: "image: container-registry.oracle.com/middleware/weblogic:12.2.1.4" to
+   * To: "image: container-registry.oracle.com/middleware/weblogic:14.1.1.0-11"
+   * Verify all the pods are restarted and back to ready state
+   * Verify the admin server is accessible and cluster member is healthy

nodes.bodyText: Remove this tag @slow. It is not being used

nodes.bodyText: Can it be moved to utility class. This is being used in many tests when we verify a domain restart.
